casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Charles SINAPI. No. 274A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 4, 2004. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Kyle Hall, Raleigh, for Robert Charles Sinapi.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of August 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Robert Charles Sinapi) shall have up to and including the 3rd day of September 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of August 2004."
